creditline: Gift of Gabriel P. and Yvonne M.L. Weisberg for the Weisberg Collection of European Drawings and Prints of the Nineteenth and Early Twentieth Centuries
description: standing figure wearing a baggy overcoat, large brimmed hat and skirt, resting his PR hand on the end of a broom handle, holding a shovel (?) behind back with PL hand
inscription:
Inscription

LRC, in the print: [57-16. (backwards)]; bottom center, printed in black: [11]
title: Man with Broom
